title: A1425 - Crashing under load
message: This logic board keeps crashing, but only under load. Likely heat related? Any suggestions on this one, I'm not really familiar with this model.

title: A1425 - Crashing under load
message:
Install HWMonitor and check for strange temps.
Also run corresponding EFI ASD...

title: A1425 - Crashing under load
message: Sorry, bumping my old thread. No odd temperatures (CPU ±80C when it crashes) reported. EFI ASD 155 won't run, I think this is caused more older macs because of a recent EFI update.

title: A1425 - Crashing under load
message:
Disconnect internal SSD and try to run again EFI ASD.

Test w/ and w/o battery connected.
